title: gtk+ build failed with "ImportError: No module named site", ring any bells?
body:
My nightly build failed last night at the `gtk+` step, which hasn't happened before.  The nail in the coffin seems to have been an ImportError (which google suggests might be a Pythonic comment).

Before I dig into it, I'm curious if it rings any bells and/or if anythings changed recently in the python and/or X world?

Here's the tail of the spack-build.out.

Thanks in advance!

```
[...]
libtool: link: ( cd ".libs" && rm -f "libgdk-x11-2.0.la" && ln -s "../libgdk-x11-2.0.la" "libgdk-x11-2.0.la" )
```
